S04n440:1: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgataḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ sarvabandhanasamucchinnaḥ sarvakleśoddhṛto nirvāntamalakleśo nihatamārapratyarthikaḥ sarvabuddhadharmanayānupraviṣṭaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī daśabalasamanvāgataścaturvaiśāradyaprāpto'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratipūrṇaḥ pañcacakṣuḥsamanvāgato'nāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā sarvāvantaṃ lokamavalokyaivaṃ cintayati sma-kasmā ayamahaṃ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam?
S04n440:2: katamaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāraḥ suvineyaḥ suvijñāpakaḥ suviśodhako mandarāgadoṣamoho'parokṣavijñāno yo'śrutavān dharmasya parihīyate?
S04n440:4: yaśca me dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyānna ca māṃ sa viheṭhayet ||
S04n440:5: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt-rudrakaḥ khalu rāmaputraḥ śuddhaḥ svākāraḥ suvijñāpakaḥ suviśodhako mandarāgamoho'parokṣavijñānaḥ |
S04n440:13: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-mahāhānirvartate rudrakasya rāmaputrasya,
S04n440:18: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhut-ko'nyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ suvineyaḥ pūrvavadyāvanna ca dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti |
S04n440:19: tato bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat-ayaṃ khalvapyārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ śuddho yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti |
S04n440:22: śuddhāvāsakāyikā api ca devatā enamarthaṃ tathāgatasyārocayanti sma-evametadbhagavan,
S04n440:26: ya imamevaṃ supraṇītaṃ dharmamaśrutvā kālagata iti ||
S04n440:27: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt-kaḥ khalvanyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāro yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti ||
S04n440:28: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat-te khalu pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ śuddhāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suviśodhakā mandarāgadoṣamohā aparokṣavijñānāḥ |
S04n440:33: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat-yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ prathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam ||
S04n440:34: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasya punaretadabhavat-kasminnetarhi pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ prativasanti?
S04n440:35: atha tathāgataḥ sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā vyavalokayan paśyati sma |
S04n440:36: adrākṣītpañcakān bhadravargīyān vārāṇasyāṃ viharata ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
S04n440:37: dṛṣṭvā ca tathāgatasyaitadabhavat-yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam |
S04n440:38: te hi mama sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājñāsyanti |
S04n440:40: caritāvino hi te bhikṣavaḥ suparipaṇḍitaśukladharmāṇo mokṣamārgābhimukhā nibandhāpanītāḥ ||
S04n440:41: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgata evamanuvicintya bodhimaṇḍādutthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprakampyānupūrveṇa magadheṣu caryāṃ caran kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat |
S04n440:42: atha gayāyāṃ bodhimaṇḍasya cāntarādanyatama ājīvako'drākṣīttathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam |
S04n440:45: ekānte sthitaśca bhikṣava ājīvakastathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā evamāha-viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi |
S04n440:46: pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāsaśca te chavivarṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma śāradaṃ kālaṃ pāṇḍuravarṇaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ bhavati,
S04n440:47: evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam |
S04n440:48: tadyathāpi nāma tālaphalasya pakvasya samanantaravṛntacyutasya bandhanāśrayaḥ pītanirbhāso bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ,
S04n440:49: evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam |
S04n440:50: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadavarṇaniṣkaḥ ulkāmukhaprakṛṣṭo dakṣiṇakarmāraputreṇa suparikarmakṛtaḥ pāṇḍukambalopanikṣipto varṇavān bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāso'tīva prabhāsvaraḥ,
S04n440:56: ācāryo na hi me kaścitsadṛśo me na vidyate |
S04n440:64: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā āśravakṣayam |
S04n440:65: jitā me pāpakā dharmāstenopaga jino hyaham ||3 ||
S04n440:68: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm |
S04n440:70: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyami gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm |
S04n440:72: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm |
S04n440:74: tadbhaviṣyasi gautama ityuktvā sa ājīvako dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prākrāmat |
S04n440:76: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato gayāyāṃ sudarśanena nāgarājena nimantrito'bhut vāsena bhaktena ca |
S04n440:80: eṣu ca sarveṣu bhikṣavastathāgato gṛhapatibhirbhaktena vāsena copanimantryamāṇo'nupūrveṇa gaṅgāyā nadyāstīramupāgamat ||
S04n440:81: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgā mahānadī suparipūrṇā samatīrthakā vahati sma ||
S04n440:84: na me'sti mārṣa tarapaṇyamityuktvā tathāgato vihāyasā pathā tīrātparaṃ tīramagamat |
S04n440:85: tataḥ sa nāvikastaṃ dṛṣṭvātīva vipratisāryabhut-evaṃvidho dakṣiṇīyo mayā na tārita iti |
S04n440:86: hā kaṣṭamiti kṛtvā mūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ patitaḥ |
S04n440:87: tata enāṃ prakṛtiṃ nāviko rājñe bimbisārāya ārocayāmāsa-śramaṇaḥ svāmi gautamastarapaṇyaṃ yācamāno nāsti tarapaṇyamityuktvā vihāyasā atastīrātparaṃ tīraṃ gata iti |
S04n440:88: tacchrutvā tadagreṇa rājñā bimbisāreṇa sarvapravrajitānāṃ tarapaṇyamutsṛṣṭamabhavat ||
S04n440:89: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato'nupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n440:90: upasaṃkramya kālyameva nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
S04n440:91: tasyāṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ yena ṛṣipatano mṛgadāvo yena ca pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma |
S04n440:92: adrākṣuḥ khalu punaḥ pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam |
S04n440:93: dṛṣṭvā ca kriyābandhamakārṣuḥ-eṣa sa āyuṣmantaḥ śramaṇo gautama āgacchati sma śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭaḥ |
S04n440:94: anena khalvapi tayāpi tāvatpūrvikayā duṣkaracaryayā na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum |
S04n440:98: na pātracīvaraṃ pratigrahītavyaṃ nāśanaṃ dātavyaṃ na pānīyaṃ paribhogyaṃ na pādapratiṣṭhānaṃ sthāpayitvātiriktānyāsanāni |
S04n440:103: yathā yathā ca bhikṣavastathāgato yena pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma,
S04n440:104: tathā tathā te svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma,
S04n440:106: tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ pañjaragataḥ syāt,
S04n440:109: evameva yathā yathā tathāgataḥ pañcakānāṃ bhadravargīyāṇāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkrāmati sma,
S04n440:110: tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma,
S04n440:112: tatkasmāt? na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yastathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā āsanānna pratyuttiṣṭhet |
S04n440:113: yathā yathā ca tathāgataḥ pañcakān bhadravargīyānupasaṃkrāmati sma,
S04n440:114: tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatasya śriyaṃ tejaścāsahamānā āsanebhyaḥ prakampyamānāḥ sarve kriyākāraṃ bhittvā cotthāyāsanebhyaḥ,
S04n440:123: pañcakā pi bhadravargīyāste tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvaikānte niṣeduḥ |
S04n440:124: ekānte niṣaṇṇāśca te pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatametadavocan-viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautamendriyāṇi,
S04n440:127: evamukte bhikṣavastathāgataḥ pañcakān bhadravargīyānevamāha-mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatamāyuṣmadvādena samudācariṣṭa |
S04n440:129: amṛtaṃ mayā bhikṣavaḥ sākṣātkṛto'mṛtagāmī ca mārgaḥ |
S04n440:135: yathā mayā samyagavavaditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā yūyamapyāśravāṇāṃ cetovimuktaṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ ca dṛṣṭa eva dharme sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyatha-kṣīṇā no jātiruṣitaṃ ca brahmacaryam,
S04n440:138: nanu ca yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava etadabhūt-ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmanta āgacchati śramaṇo gautamaḥ śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭa iti pūrvavat |
S04n440:140: teṣāṃ ca ehi bhikṣava ityukte yatkiṃcittīrthikaliṅgaṃ tīrthikadhvajaḥ,
S04n440:146: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ pañcakā bhadravargīyā bhikṣavastathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyātyayaṃ deśayanti sma |
S04n440:147: tathāgatasyāntike śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ premaṃ ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti sma |
S04n440:148: gauravajātāśca bahuvicitrapuṣkariṇyāṃ tathāgatasya snānaparikarma kurvanti sma |
S04n440:149: snānapratyuttīrṇasya ca bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat-kasmin khalu pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairniṣadya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
S04n440:152: atha tathāgataḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ gauraveṇa trīṇyāsanāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtya siṃha iva nirbhīścaturtha āsane paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma |
S04n440:153: pañcakā api bhikṣavastathāgatasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya tathāgatasya purato niṣeduḥ ||
S04n440:154: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpāṃ kāyātprabhāṃ tathāgataḥ prāmuñcadyayā prabhayā ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo'bhūt |
S04n440:155: tena cāvabhāsena yā api lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakāratamisrā yatremau candrasūryau evaṃmaharddhikāvevaṃ mahānubhāvāvevaṃ maheśākhyau ābhayā ābhāṃ varṇenaṃ varṇaṃ tejasā tejo nābhitapato nābhivirocataḥ |
S04n440:156: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakasvakamapi bāhuṃ prasāritaṃ na paśyanti sma,
S04n440:157: tatrāpi tasmin samaye mahata udārasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo'bhut |
S04n440:158: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāste tenāvabhāsena parisphuṭāḥ samānā anyonyaṃ paśyanti sma |
S04n440:160: evaṃ cāhuḥ-anye'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ,
S04n440:161: anye'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ iti |
S04n440:162: ayaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamabhūt-akampat prākampat saṃprākampat |
S04n440:179: tasmiṃśca samaye harṣaṇīyāstoṣaṇīyāḥ premaṇīyāḥ prasādanīyā avalokanīyāḥ prahlādanīyā nirvarṇanīyā aprativarṇanīyā asecanīyā apratikūlā anuttrāsakarāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante sma |
S04n440:180: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin kṣaṇe viheṭhā vā trāso vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vābhūt |
S04n440:181: na ca bhūyaḥ sūryacandramasorna śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe prabhāḥ prajñāyante sma |
S04n440:182: sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokopapannāśca sattvāstasmin kṣaṇe vigataduḥkhā abhuvan sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ |
S04n440:183: na ca kasyacitsattvasya rāgo bādhate sma,
S04n440:184: dveṣo vā moho vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā mado vā krodho vā vyāpādo vā paridāho vā |
S04n440:185: sarvasattvāstasmin kṣaṇe maitracittāḥ hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino'bhūvan |
S04n440:193: sabalaṃ nihatya māraṃ bodhiprāpto hitāya lokasya |
S04n440:199: yaḥ śrotukāmu dharmaṃ yaḥ kalpanayutaiḥ samārjitu jinena |
S04n440:203: prāptāśca te'dya sarve buddhotpādaḥ kṣaṇastathā śraddhā |
S04n440:205: bhavati kadācidavasthā yaḥ kalpanayutairna śrūyate dharmaḥ |
S04n440:206: saṃprāptaḥ sa ca vādya pramādamakhilaṃ vivarjayata ||16 ||
S04n440:208: āyāta laghuṃ sarve vartayitā nāyako hyamṛtacakram ||17 ||
S04n440:210: tyaktvā devasamṛddhiṃ prāptā buddhasya te pārśve ||18 ||
S04n440:211: iti hi bhikṣavo bhaumaidevairvārāṇasyāṃ ṛpipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ tathāgatasya mahāmaṇḍalamātro'dhiṣṭhito'bhūt citro darśanīyo vipulo vistīrṇaḥ saptayojanaśatānyāyāmo vistāreṇa |
S04n440:213: kāmāvacarai rūpāvacaraiśca devaputraiścaturaśītisiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatāyopanāmitānyabhūvan-iha niṣadya bhagavān dharmacakraṃ pravartayatu asmākamanukampāmupādāyeti ||
S04n440:214: atha khalu bhikṣavastasmin samaye pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhya ūrdhvamadhaḥ samantāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahavo bodhisattvakoṭyaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasamanvāgatā āgatya tathāgatasya caraṇayornipatya dharmacakrapravartanāyādhyeṣante sma |
S04n440:215: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakro vā brahmā vā lokapālā vā tadanye vā maheśākhyamaheśākhyā devaputrāste'pi sarve tathāgatasya caraṇayoḥ śirobhiḥ praṇipatya tathāgatamadhyeṣante sma dharmacakrapravartanāya-pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram,
S04n440:216: pravartayatu sugato dharmacakraṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca |
S04n440:223: trisahasra ito bahu brahma sureśvara pāla tathā
S04n440:225: smara pūrvapratijñāṃ mahāmuni yā tvaya vāca kṛtā
S04n440:226: ahu jyeṣṭhu viśiṣṭu prajāya kariṣye dukhasya kṣayam ||19 ||
S04n440:227: tvaya dharṣitu mārū sasainyu drumendri sthihitva mune
S04n440:229: abhiprāyu prapūrṇa aśeṣa ya cintita kalpaśatā
S04n440:237: aṣṭāṅgikamārgajalo dhara varṣa samehi jagasya tṛṣāṃ
S04n440:243: ṣaḍi pāramite cirarātru vivardhitu kośu tvayā
S04n440:244: asamaṃ tu acālyu praṇītu susaṃcitu dharmadhanam |
S04n440:245: praja sarva anātha daridra anāyika dṛṣṭva imāṃ
S04n440:246: vicaraṃ dhana sapta vināyaka cakra pravartayahī ||24 ||
S04n440:247: dhanadhānya hiraṇyasuvarṇa tathaiva ca vastra śubhā
S04n440:248: vara puṣpa vilepana dhūpana cūrṇa gṛhāśca varāḥ |
S04n440:250: jina bodhi gaveṣata sātivibuddha pravartaya cakravaram ||25 ||
S04n440:251: tatha śīlu akhaṇḍu akalmaṣu rakṣitu kalpaśatāṃ
S04n440:252: sada kṣānti subhāvita vīrya alīnu abhūṣi tava |
S04n440:253: vara dhyāna abhijña vipaśyana prajña upekṣa mune
S04n440:255: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ cakraṃ sarvaratnapratyuptaṃ sarvaratnapraśobhitaṃ nānāratnālaṃkāravyūhavibhūṣitaṃ sahasrāraṃ sahasraraśmi sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sapuṣpadāmaṃ sahemajālaṃ sakiṅkiṇījālaṃ sagandhahastaṃ sapūrṇakumbhaṃ sanandikāvartaṃ sasvastikālaṃkṛtaṃ nānāraṅgaraktadivyavastropaśobhitaṃ divyapuṣpagandhamālyavilepanānuliptaṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ tathāgatāya dharmacakrapravartanāya pūrvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtaṃ bodhisattvāśayaviśodhitaṃ tathāgatapūjārhaṃ sarvatathāgatasamanvāhṛtaṃ sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānāvilopitaṃ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pratyeṣitaṃ pravartitapūrvaṃ ca dharmacakramupanāmayati sma |
S04n440:261: na ca śakya sarvi gaṇanāya anupraveṣṭuṃ
S04n440:267: sā sarva saṃsthita viyūha ti dharmacakre
S04n440:273: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato rātryāḥ prathame yāme tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayati sma |
S04n440:274: rātryā madhyame yāme saṃrañjanīyāṃ kathāṃ pravartayati sma |
S04n440:275: rātryāḥ paścime yāme pañcakān bhadravargīyānāmantryaitadavocat - dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ pravrajitasyāntāvakramau |
S04n440:276: yaśca kāmeṣu kāmasukhallikā yogo hīno grāmyaḥ pārthagjaniko nālamāryo'narthopasaṃhito nāyatyāṃ brahmacaryāya na nirvide na virāgāya na nirodhāya nābhijñāya na saṃbodhaye na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate |
S04n440:277: yā ceyamamadhyamā pratipadā ātmakāyaklamathānuyogo duḥkho'narthopasaṃhito dṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhaścāyatyāṃ ca duḥkhavipākaḥ |
S04n440:278: etau ca bhikṣavo dvāvantāvanupagamya madhyamayaiva pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati-yaduta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiriti |
S04n440:283: jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi apriyasaṃprayogo'pi priyaviprayogo'pi duḥkham |
S04n440:284: yadapi icchan paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham |
S04n440:288: yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī ayamucyate duḥkhasamudayaḥ |
S04n440:290: yo'syā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ punarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā janikāyā nirvartikāyā aśeṣo virāgo nirodhaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ |
S04n440:297: iti duḥkhamiti me bhikṣavaḥ purvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamutpannaṃ cakṣurutpannaṃ vidyotpannā bhūrirutpannā meghotpannā prajñotpannā ālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
S04n440:298: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudaya iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamutpannaṃ cakṣurutpannaṃ vidyotpannā bhūrirutpannā meghotpannā prajñotpannā ālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
S04n440:299: ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iti me bhikṣavaḥ sarvaṃ pūrvavadyāvadālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
S04n440:300: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavadeva peyālaṃ yāvadālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
S04n440:301: yatkhalvidaṃ duḥkhaṃ parijñeyamiti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavadeva peyālaṃ yāvadālokaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
S04n440:302: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ prahātavya iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśrateṣu dharmeṣu sarvaṃ yāvadāloka iti |
S04n440:303: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavya iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavadyāvadāloka iti |
S04n440:304: sā khalviyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadbhāvayitavyeti pūrvavadyāvadāloka iti |
S04n440:305: tatkhalvidaṃ duḥkhaṃ parijñātamiti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśrateṣu iti peyālam |
S04n440:306: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ prahīṇa iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteti peyālam |
S04n440:307: sa khalvayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteti peyālam |
S04n440:308: sā khalviyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadbhāviteti me bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamutpannaṃ cakṣurutpannaṃ bhūrirutpannā vidyotpannā medhotpannā prajñotpannā ālokaḥ prādūrbhūtaḥ ||
S04n440:309: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvadeva me eṣu caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvato evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate,
S04n440:310: na tāvadahaṃ bhikṣavo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho'smi iti pratijñāsiṣam |
S04n440:312: yataśca me bhikṣava eṣu caturṣvāryasatyeṣvevaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ jñānadarśanamutpannam,
S04n440:327: jihvā pi kāya mana duḥkhā anātma śūnyā |
S04n440:329: naivātra ātma na naro na ca jīvamasti ||32 ||
S04n440:332: na ca kārako'sti tatha naiva ca vedako'sti
S04n440:333: na ca karma paśyati kṛtaṃ hyaśubhaṃ śubhaṃ vā ||33 ||
S04n440:339: bhavate avidya na pi saṃbhavako'sya kaści |
S04n440:342: vijñāna nāma tatha ca rūpa samutthitāsti
S04n440:353: na ca ātma pudgalu na saṃkramako'sti kaści ||38 ||
S04n440:355: yadyoniśo bhavati na tatra avidya kāci |
S04n440:360: na skandha āyatana dhātu vademi buddhaṃ
S04n440:367: kauṇḍinyena ca ājñātaṃ nirvṛttā ratanā trayaḥ ||42 ||
S04n440:377: teṣāṃ viśodhitaṃ cakṣu muktā sarvebhi durgatī ||47 ||
S04n440:378: daśadiśatu ananta buddhasvaro gacchi tasmiṃ kṣaṇe
S04n440:379: ruta madhura manojña saṃśrūyante cāntarīkṣe śubha |
S04n440:382: daśa diśita yi keci buddhaśatā sarvi tūṣṇībhutāḥ
S04n440:383: teṣa muninaye upasthāyakāḥ sarvi pṛcchī jināṃ |
S04n440:384: kimiti daśabalebhi dharmākathā chinna śrutvā rūtaṃ
S04n440:385: sādhu bhaṇata śīghra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tūṣṇībhāvena sthitāḥ ||49 ||
S04n440:388: tena hitakareṇa uttaptatā prāpta bodhiḥ śivā
S04n440:390: imu vacana śruṇitva teṣāṃ munīsattvakoṭyaḥ śatā
S04n440:394: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-ime bhagavan daśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavataḥ sakāśāddharmacakrapravartanavikurvaṇasya praveśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ |
S04n440:395: tatsādhu bhagavān deśayatu tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kiyadrūpaṃ tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitam?
S04n440:407: tatkhalu punarmaitreya dharmacakraṃ sarvadharmaprakṛtisvabhāvaṃ saṃdarśanavibhavacakraṃ anutpādānirodhāsaṃbhavacakraṃ anālayacakraṃ akalpāvikalpadharmanayavistīraṇacakraṃ śūnyatācakraṃ animittacakraṃ apraṇihitacakraṃ anabhisaṃskāracakraṃ vivekacakraṃ virāgacakraṃ virodhacakraṃ tathāgatānubodhacakraṃ dharmadhātvasaṃbhedacakram |
S04n440:408: bhūtakoṭyavikopanacakraṃ asaṅgānāvaraṇacakraṃ pratītyāvatārobhayāntadṛṣṭisamatikramaṇacakraṃ anantamadhyadharmadhātvavikopanacakraṃ anābhogabuddhakāryapratipraśrabdhacakraṃ apravṛtyabhinirvṛtticakraṃ atyantānupalabdhicakraṃ anāyūhāniryūhacakraṃ anabhilāpyacakraṃ prakṛtiyathāvaccakraṃ ekaviṣayasarvadharmasamatāvatāracakraṃ akṣaṇasattvavinayādhiṣṭhānapratyudāvartyacakraṃ advayasamāropaparamārthanayapraveśacakraṃ dharmadhātusamavasaraṇacakram |
S04n440:415: nigraho mārāṇāṃ parājayastīrthikānāṃ samatikrāmaṇaṃ saṃsāraviṣayādavatāraṇaṃ buddhaviṣaye parijñātamāryapudgalairanubaddhaṃ pratyekabuddhaiḥ parigṛhītaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ stutaṃ sarvabuddhairasaṃbhinnaṃ sarvatathāgataiḥ |
S04n440:416: evaṃrūpaṃ bhaitreya tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ yasya pravartanāttathāgata ityucyate |
S04n440:641: gupto jitendriyo nāga iva sudānto hrada ivāccho'nāvilo viprasanna ityucyate |
S04n440:683: dīrgharātraṃ satkṛtya dharmaśravaṇagrahaṇadhāraṇavācanavijñāpanārthapadaniścayanistīraṇakauśalyena jarāvyādhimaraṇābhimukhānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śaraṇagamanānupradānasatkṛtyadharmadeśanāparibhavabuddhitvātkośopagatabastiguhya ityucyate |
S04n440:700: dīrgharātraṃ mātāpitṛśramaṇabrāhmaṇagurudakṣiṇīyānāṃ pratyutthānapratyudramanābhivādanakāmānāṃ ca sarvaśāstravaiśāradyena vivādakāmasattvanigrahasvadharmavinayānulomanasamyakpravṛttarājāmātyasamyakpravṛttakuśala-dharmapathapratiṣṭhāpanaprabhāvanatathāgataśāsanaparigrahasaṃdhāraṇasarvakuśalacaryāsamādāpana pūrvaṃgamatvātsiṃhahanurityucyate |
S04n440:746: nairyāṇikīṃ pratipadaṃ pratipadyamāno nirvāṇamārāgayiṣyatīti pratijñārohaṇasadevake loke'praticodyapratijñāvaiśāradyaprāptatvānnairyāṇikīṃ pratipadaṃ pratipadyamāno nirvāṇamārāgayiṣyatīti pratijñārohaṇasadevake loke'praticodyapratijñāvaiśāradyaprāpta ityucyate |
S04n440:796: idaṃ tanmaitreya dharmacakrapravartanaṃ tathāgataguṇavarṇapradeśasya yatkiṃcidavatāramātraṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirdeśitaḥ vistareṇa punamaitreya tathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā nirdiśet |
S04n440:800: yatra mārā na gāhante sarve ca paratīrthikāḥ ||52 ||
S04n440:815: cakṣuḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnyaṃ śrotaṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathaiva ca |
S04n440:816: jihvā kāyaṃ ca cittaṃ ca śūnyātmāno nirīhakaḥ ||60 ||
S04n440:825: naṣṭamārgā hi ye sattvā mārgaṃ deśemi uttamam |
